Welcome to the John AI Lab at the School of Computing, National University of Singapore.

News

  • October 24, 2024
    Here is a short news.
  • September 26, 2024
    Our paper Accelerating greedy coordinate gradient via probe sampling has been accepted by NeurIPS 2024.
  • September 20, 2024
    Our papers Reasoning Robustness of LLMs to Adversarial Typographical Errors and Advancing Adversarial Suffix Transfer Learning on Aligned Large Language Models have been accepted by EMNLP 2024.

Research

MixEval-X

Any-to-Any Evaluations from Real-World Data Mixtures.

Read more »

Beam Search for Reasoning

A framework of stepwise LLM reasoning.

Read more »

Noisy Student

A semi-supervised learning method which achieves 88.4% top-1 accuracy on ImageNet.

Read more »

RACE Dataset

Large-scale reading comprehension dataset designed to evaluate machine understanding of text.
